item.description:
Join Sandy and I for a hike in the White Mountains Mt Pierce via Crawford Path. We are carpooling from the EMS back parking lot in Lebanon and driving up to Twin Mountain and hiking Mt Pierce.

We will be Meeting Up with my hiking group, so there will be lots of conversation on this popular trail. Hopefully we get some good views of the Presidential Mountains too!

The greyjay birds love to eat out of your hand, so bring a little treat and your camera.

Pace: Easy but experienced for winter conditions. Microspikes and snowshoes are required.

Mileage: about 8+ miles with a 1pm turn around

Elevation gain: about 2300ft

Meet at the EMS back parking lot OR trailhead.

We will start the hike on the Crawford Path at 9AM. Since I will have a group waiting for me, it is important that we meet on time.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Mt Pierce via Crawford Path easy paced
